upgrades.name: Attack Bonus I
upgrades.description:
+10% base attack power

Increases the raw attack power of all heroes, making their auto-attacks and abilities deal more damage.

upgrades.name: Attack Bonus II
upgrades.description:
+10% base attack power (stacks with I)

Further increases attack power, compounding with previous attack bonuses for significant damage growth.

upgrades.name: Attack Bonus III
upgrades.description:
+15% base attack power (stacks with I & II)

Major attack power upgrade that dramatically increases damage output across all heroes and abilities.

upgrades.name: Better Loot I
upgrades.description:
+10% item quality chance per prestige level

Increases the likelihood of finding higher-quality items (Uncommon, Rare, Epic) from enemies and chests. Quality bonus scales with your prestige level.

upgrades.name: Better Loot II
upgrades.description:
+15% item quality chance per prestige level

Significantly improves item quality rolls, making Epic and Legendary items much more common as you progress through prestige levels.

upgrades.name: Gear Affinity I
upgrades.description:
+5% stat effectiveness from gear

Increases the effectiveness of all equipped items, making your gear provide more stats and combat power. Essential for maximizing equipment value.

upgrades.name: Gear Affinity II
upgrades.description:
+10% stat effectiveness from gear

Significantly enhances gear performance, making high-quality equipment even more powerful and rewarding investment in better items.

upgrades.name: Talent Efficiency I
upgrades.description:
-10% talent point cost

Reduces the prestige points required to purchase talent upgrades, making it easier to customize your heroes' abilities and playstyle.

upgrades.name: Talent Efficiency II
upgrades.description:
-15% talent point cost

Major reduction in talent costs, allowing for much more flexible hero customization and faster progression through the talent trees.

upgrades.name: Talent Mastery I
upgrades.description: +1 prestige talent point per prestige level
